content.rendered:
Overview

RG Luxury Homes is the modern interpretation of world-class exclusivity. This residential vibrancy constitutes

18.5 acres (74.867 Sq mt.) of development and is spread across 7.5 acres (30.351 Sq. mt.J of sprawling greens brimming with pleasant sunlight and fresh air. This elegantly designed project offers numerous residences in the 3 BHK + 2 T configuration. Built to exceed one's highest expectations, RG Luxury is exceptionally well-planned with 3 side open spaces, exclusivity as well as quality written all over it.

2 BHK LUXURY APARTMENTS

3 BHK LUXURY APARTMENTS

HIGHLIGHTS

CHANGE TO HOMES WITH A RESORT-LIKE LIFESTYLE

Live the way you would in a resort. It has all been designed to give you a relaxed outlook.

  • Jogging and Cycling Track
  • Amphitheater Tennis, Badminton & Basketball CourtKids Play Area
    Floating Garden
  • Swimming Pool with Kids Pools
  • Ultra modern Gym, Zumba, Steam & Sauna and Yoga Centre
  • Club House with Indoor Games, Banquet Hall, Mini Theatre, Cafeteria, Squash Court.

CHANGE TO HOMES WITH WORLD-CLASS SPORTS FACILITIES

Be a sport for life with the sports facilities here; whatever be your preference, you have a choice.

•Landscaped Podium Garden Amphitheater Kids Play Area


•Jogging & cycling track Multi-purpose hall Tennis & badminton court Indoor Squash Courts


•Swimming pool & toddler pool, spa, steam & sauna, health club, ultra-modern gym and meditation garden


•Indoor games provision: table tennis, card room, pool table

CHANGE TO HOMES WITH AN ACTIVE SOCIAL LIFE

Love to mingle? This is the place for you. Whether it’s about old friends coming over or making new ones in the neighborhood, your social life is sure to thrive here.

• Vaastu compliant layout plan


• Eco-friendly construction


• Provision for rain water harvesting


• Sufficient Sunlight and Ventilation


• 3 Side Open Apartments

CHANGE TO HOMES WHERE THE KIDS HAVE FUN TOO

Anytime is fun-time here for the little ones. All their need for excitement and activities has been well taken care of.

  • Total Towers – 13
    Phase I – 9 Towers – Sold out (A,B,C,D,E,F,G,H&M)
    Phase II – 4 Towers (I,J,K&L)
  • Phase II Size
    3 BHK + 2T – 1175 sqft.
  • Terms and conditions apply

FLOOR PLANS

LOCATION MAP

OPEN UP TO A GREAT LOCATION

 

 Eco-friendly Landscaped Podium Garden.

 Jogging, Cycling Track & Amphitheatre.

 Tennis, Badminton & Basketball Court.

 Swimming Pool & Toddler Pool.

 Ultra-modern Gym & Yoga Centre.

 State-of-the-art Clubhouse.

 24X7 security system with CCTV provision.

 100% power back-up in common area & fresh water supply.

 Indoor Games Provision – Table Tennis, Card Room & Pool Table.

ABOUT ELDECO GROUP

RG Luxury Homes is the modern interpretation of world-class exclusivity. This residential vibrancy constitutes

18.5 acres (74.867 Sq mt.) of development and is spread across 7.5 acres (30.351 Sq. mt.J of sprawling greens brimming with pleasant sunlight and fresh air. This elegantly designed project offers numerous residences in the 3 BHK + 2 T configuration. Built to exceed one’s highest expectations, RG Luxury is exceptionally well-planned with 3 side open spaces, exclusivity as well as quality written all over it.

Site Address : RG Luxury Plot No. GH-07 A, Sec-16 B, Greater Noida (West), UP-201306

B R O C H U R E   D O W N L O A D

Do you want to talk with one of our Real Estate Experts?

Call Now: +91 9565 699 699
